analysis.description:
ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#156-164) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(weiValue) (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#163-164)

ZiberToken (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#21-307) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#164-177)

ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#156-164) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- weiValue == 0
weiRefunded in ZiberToken.refund (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#161-162) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in ZiberToken.claim_bounty (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#230-262):
	External calls:
	- token.proxyPayment.value(this.balance - bounty)(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#245-246)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- time_bought (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#254-259)

DaoToken.CAP should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#15-16)
DaoToken.totalEthers should be constant (/unique_chucks/35/0xea7cbf19027087ba91ad110e95a5c2a532d35100.sol#16-17)
